title: Very scarce T216 Demmitt SCRAP...blank-backed and handcut for trade!!
author: shammus

posts.post_title: Very scarce T216 Demmitt SCRAP...blank-backed and handcut for trade!!
posts.post_content:
Demmitt has neat oversized borders and is a handcut, blank-backed example.  Very tough to find printer's scrap from non t206 sets and I can't imagine too many of these exist for t216.

Don't have a dollar amount in mind to sell the card for but thought I'd at least offer it up for other cards I could use -

t204 HOFers
1918 Zeenuts
e97 B&Ws
e98 Chase (red)

Cash offers accepted too.  

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=286335&d=1504372083[/IMG]
